standup.title: Almost everyone leaves
standup.summary: Almost everyone leaves standup and one person has to look at the board to tell everyone else what's happening
standup.description: Everyone except one team member leaves standup. The person left needs to take a look at the board and try to understand what the status of everyone's work is. While they do this, it's fun for the rest of the team to chat together - either around the corner if everyone's in the same office or on a separate call if you do your standups remote-first
benefits: Helps the team connect on a personal level
